Es muy fácil. Corres caverna, pickeas cabezinha le pones una. Miras para el costado para la flash del de jungla, pickeas roja le pones una al otro, smokeas para pasar al site. Flasheas CT, tu compañero mata otro, te subís a la caja y matas al de jungla que nunca tuvo chances de matarte.

It is a good gaem BUTT there are a lot of very good players around that love to stomp on noobs, so.. some times it feels like waste of time. Still play it for some reason. I won't get any better that train has sailed

One of the best shooter games ever. Sad vac is not working and it became free so codes are now a usual thing do. Private servers such as EliteGamers still exist where a more decent game play is offered so it`s a go for the game.
Probably the most balanced and fun game ever played (maybe bo2 beats it)

Great game, very fun to play. One of the best anti-cheat softwares I have ever played with. Nice invention with the skins and the cases. Fair odds to unlock cool skins and get your money back. Buy it and have fun, invest your money in cases, you will get it back. Trust me.

I really like the game itself.

What I dont like is the current state of matchmaking; 9 out of 10 games you will find cheaters. And I mean straight up full spinbot lobbys, Valve really doesnt care. Its unplayable.
